name: Button Is Pet Cat
description:
Button Is Pet Cat is a game in which you change the controls by manipulating objects in the game world. And pet cats.


Controls KeyboardGamepadFunctionEscapeStartMenu
Q

UndoERight trigger
RedoLeft, Right, Up, Down, W, A, S, D
Left, Right, Up, Down, A, B, X, Y

Game by Chainsawkitten and Mechanista.

Music by Kevin MacLeod.

Sound effects by soundmary, Mafon2, RSilveira_88.

Inspired by Baba Is You by Arvi Teikari.
